name: Outline
description: Team knowledge base and wiki (requires PostgreSQL and Redis)

commands.run: docker run -d --name outline --network {{NETWORK_NAME}} -p 3030:3000 -v ~/wsdata/outline/data:/var/lib/outline/data -e SECRET_KEY={{SECRET_KEY}} -e UTILS_SECRET={{UTILS_SECRET}} -e DATABASE_URL=postgres://homelab:{{DATABASE_PASSWORD}}@postgresql:5432/homelab -e PGSSLMODE=disable -e REDIS_URL=redis://redis:6379 -e URL=https://outline.{{domain}} -e PORT=3000 outlinewiki/outline:latest
